response.answer_text: Hey, Do you mean what are the normal / best ways paragraphs should be written? I wasn’t really sure about your question, but no one has answered so thought I’d give it a shot to see if I can help out at all. Normally, paragraphs contain: A topic sentence to show what the paragraph is aboutAn addition 3 to 6 follow-up sentences giving explanations and examplesHere’s a video on how to write quality paragraphs in essays:  All the best! Regards,Chris

Narrative Cause and Effect Classification and Division Comparison and Contrast Process Analysis Argument These are patterns, sometimes called modes of writing. I think they are ways to think about subjects.
